name: 資訊管理
description: The goal of this course is to let the students learn how information technology enhances the effectiveness and efficiency of business management and improves the enterprises competitive advantages. The topics include the intertwined relationship between the revolution of information technology and business management, the components of information systems, how to plan and build information systems, the roles of information management in business management, how to improve the competitive advantages of enterprises by information technology, etc.
goals: 瞭解資訊科技的要素及發展以及於企業經營中所扮演的角色
瞭解如何運用資訊科技提升競爭優勢，以及規劃與建置資訊系統
瞭解資訊科技相關的道德倫理問題
培養跟同輩合作向大眾分享資訊科技知識的能力
